author: cms-sw
body: `scram project el8_amd64_gcc12/CMSSW_14_1_ROOT6_X_2024-02-19-2300` and `scram project CMSSW_14_1_ROOT6_X_2024-02-19-2300/el8_amd64_gcc12` are shorthands for `scram -a el8_amd64_gcc12 project CMSSW_14_1_ROOT6_X_2024-02-19-2300` - useful for testing IB failures by copying part of the log URL (`https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/logreader/**el8_amd64_gcc12/CMSSW_14_1_ROOT6_X_2024-02-19-2300**/unitTestLogs/Validation/Geometry#/13-13`)
title: Add shorthand way of setting SCRAM_ARCH together with project
